H0.text: who picks the players in the nfl draft. NFL Commissioner

H1.text: who picks the players in the nfl draft. NFL Draft Committee

H2.text: who picks the players in the nfl draft. Team Owners

H3.text: who picks the players in the nfl draft. each team

A4.text: Each team is given a position in the drafting order

A5.text: From this position, the team can either select a player or trade its position to another team for other draft positions, a player, or players, or any combination thereof
